author: mkalen
msg: Patch by Don Lyon: add support for Oracle-extensions and large LOB support using Oracle9i with JBoss.

author: mkalen
msg: Move some environment class/env checks away from main targets. Users are getting confused and Gump needs silly assignments if requirements that are not needed by main/junit are kept in main environment-check. (Re ANT_HOME: if you don't have Ant even the check wouldn't run, keep it in doc target only.)

author: tomdz
msg: * new attribute generate-repository-info at ojb.class that prevents field/reference/collection descriptors and the related table schema from being generated; generate-table-info now only prevents the table schema but not the repository info

* support for having types that do not map to a table (generate-table-info = false) as the target in a reference/element in a collection, with automatic virtual pull-up of the necessary primary/foreign keys from the hierarchy
Needs a bit more work though when using indirection tables (there a still a few test cases failing)

author: mkalen
msg: Remove som warnings. Merge with OJB_1_0_RELEASE branch: Patch by Vadim Gritsenko: assert that classToPrefetch is always restored in a finally clause after temporary modification.
